tooltip.consularsorigins.sun_protection: Shields you from burning in daylight
tooltip.consularsorigins.rain_protection: Shields you from being hurt by rain
origin.consularsorigins.stoneling.name: Stoneling
origin.consularsorigins.stoneling.descri: A species of rock people that thrive in caves. It's rumoured that they can evolve using some kind of totem.
power.consularsorigins.noveins.name: No Veins
power.consularsorigins.noveins.descripti: You have no veins. Therefore, you cannot be poisoned.
power.consularsorigins.nighteye.name: Cave Vision
power.consularsorigins.nighteye.descript: You have night vision as long as you are not exposed to direct sunlight.
power.consularsorigins.habitatboundstone: You've been in a cave your whole life, causing you to burn in the sun.
power.consularsorigins.cavedweller.name: Cave Dweller
power.consularsorigins.cavedweller.descr: Your starting spawnpoint is in a cave.
power.consularsorigins.stoneling_evolve_: You can evolve by crafting a Golem Totem.
origin.consularsorigins.gnome.name: Gnome
origin.consularsorigins.gnome.descriptio: A species of 1 block tall people who pick up skills easily.
power.consularsorigins.hastey.name: Hastey
power.consularsorigins.hastey.descriptio: You mine every block faster than normal.
power.consularsorigins.half_sized.name: Half Sized
power.consularsorigins.half_sized.descri: You are half the size of a human. With half the health, half the reach, but with a higher jump and more speed.
power.consularsorigins.strongerpickaxe.d: You have a +1 damage boost with pickaxes
power.consularsorigins.adaptive.name: Adaptive
power.consularsorigins.adaptive.descript: You become proficient with the first tool/weapon you use.
power.consularsorigins.light.name: Light
power.consularsorigins.light.description: You are immune to fall damage.
power.consularsorigins.wieldy.name: Wieldy
power.consularsorigins.wieldy.descriptio: You can swing swords faster than others.
origin.consularsorigins.kobold.name: Kobold
origin.consularsorigins.kobold.descripti: A species of 1 block tall people who mine better than humans.
power.consularsorigins.dash.name: Dash
power.consularsorigins.dash.description: You can dash in the direction you're facing in.
power.consularsorigins.dynamite.name: Dynamite
power.consularsorigins.dynamite.descript: You can throw tnt at any time.
power.consularsorigins.silk_touch.name: Silk Touch
power.consularsorigins.silk_touch.descri: You've mastered the art of mining, allowing you to harvest blocks without damaging them. (Togglable with Secondary Ability)
origin.consularsorigins.halfling.name: Halfling
origin.consularsorigins.halfling.descrip: A species of 1 block tall people who have mastered the art of woodcutting.
power.consularsorigins.lumberjack.name: Lumberjack
power.consularsorigins.lumberjack.descri: You break logs twice as fast as humans.
power.consularsorigins.carpenter.name: Carpenter
power.consularsorigins.carpenter.descrip: You excell are breaking down wood, you know how to maximize your stick output.
power.consularsorigins.lorax.name: Lorax
power.consularsorigins.lorax.description: You speak for the trees. You can bonemeal any sapling within a 16 block radius.
power.consularsorigins.crafter.name: Hand Crafter
power.consularsorigins.crafter.descripti: You're too good for a crafting table. You can do it by hand.
power.consularsorigins.careful_picker.de: When you break leaves, you always get its sapling.
origin.consularsorigins.dwarf.name: Dwarf
origin.consularsorigins.dwarf.descriptio: A species of 1 block tall people who fight better than humans.
origin.consularsorigins.brute.name: Brute
origin.consularsorigins.brute.descriptio: Half piglin brute, half human. These barbaric people are a pretty useful tool in combat.
power.consularsorigins.brute_force.name: Brute Force
power.consularsorigins.brute_force.descr: You have a +2 damage boost with axes.
power.consularsorigins.chunky.name: Chunky
power.consularsorigins.chunky.descriptio: You have twice the health of a human. At the cost of slower movement speed.
power.consularsorigins.half_piglin.name: Half Piglin
power.consularsorigins.half_piglin.descr: You are half piglin, and other piglins notice it. Piglins and Piglin Brutes will not attack you.
power.consularsorigins.barbaricrage.name: Barbaric Rage
power.consularsorigins.barbaricrage.desc: Your barbaric nature allows you to channel your anger to stay alive.
origin.consularsorigins.babyzombie.name: Husk
origin.consularsorigins.babyzombie.descr: With the traits of a husk, these creatures are sure to cause trouble!
power.consularsorigins.undead.name: Undead
power.consularsorigins.undead.descriptio: You burn when exposed to direct sunlight.
power.consularsorigins.alreadydead.name: Already Dead
power.consularsorigins.alreadydead.descr: You are uneffected by poison. But you're also not effected by regeneration.
power.consularsorigins.hungerpunch.name: Husk
power.consularsorigins.hungerpunch.descr: Anything you hit is inflicted with poison.
power.consularsorigins.zombiealigned.des: Zombies and Husks will not attack you.
origin.consularsorigins.skeleton.name: Skeleton
origin.consularsorigins.skeleton.descrip: These undead creatures are excellent archers! They even evolve when they slay the wither!
power.consularsorigins.shoot_arrow.name: Archer
power.consularsorigins.shoot_arrow.descr: You can fire an arrow at any time.
power.consularsorigins.archersbond.name: Archers Bond
power.consularsorigins.charge.name: Charge
power.consularsorigins.charge.descriptio: You get a slight speed boost when holding a sword.
power.consularsorigins.madeofbones.name: Made Of Bones
power.consularsorigins.madeofbones.descr: You're made of bones. And uh... wolves. You get a slowness buff when wolves are nearby.
text.consularsorigins.become_wither: You have become a Wither Skeleton!
origin.consularsorigins.axolotl.name: Axolotl
origin.consularsorigins.axolotl.descript: These aquatic creatures thirve in water, but can survive outside for a brief moment.
power.consularsorigins.playdead.name: Play Dead
power.consularsorigins.playdead.descript: You can regenerate your health rapidly. (Primary Ability)
power.consularsorigins.airconserve.name: Air Conserve
power.consularsorigins.airconserve.descr: You can survive out of water for 5 minutes
power.consularsorigins.waterlegs.name: Water Legs
power.consularsorigins.waterlegs.descrip: Your legs are built for water, and cannot go very fast on land
power.consularsorigins.water_vision.name: Water Vision
power.consularsorigins.waterspawn.name: Water Spawn
power.consularsorigins.waterspawn.descri: You will spawn in a shipwreck. (Hopefully underwater)
These undead creatures are excellent archers, and immnue to fire!!
power.consularsorigins.shoot_flaming_arr: You can fire a flaming arrow at any time.
power.consularsorigins.supercharge.name: Super Charge
power.consularsorigins.supercharge.descr: You get a speed boost when holding a sword.
power.consularsorigins.fire_immunity.des: You are immune to fire and lava.
power.consularsorigins.alreadywither.des: You are immune to the wither effect.
power.consularsorigins.skeletonbond.name: Skelly Bond
power.consularsorigins.skeletonbond.desc: Skeletons and Wither Skeletons won't attack you.
origin.consularsorigins.golem.name: Golem
origin.consularsorigins.golem.descriptio: An evolved species of Stoneling. They've evolved to survive exposed to the sun, and have become stronger.
power.consularsorigins.super_armor.name: Super Armor
power.consularsorigins.super_armor.descr: You have even more natural armor than before!
power.consularsorigins.strong.name: Strong
power.consularsorigins.strong.descriptio: You do more damage than usual.
origin.consularsorigins.warden.name: Warden
origin.consularsorigins.warden.descripti: The Warden is a blind creature that relies completely on vibrations.
power.consularsorigins.blind.name: Blind
power.consularsorigins.blind.description: You are completely blind, this also means you cannot sprint.
power.consularsorigins.sonic_boom.name: Sonic Boom
power.consularsorigins.sonic_boom.descri: You can release a sonically charged shriek at a target within 20 blocks.
power.consularsorigins.sculk_shader.name: Vibrations
power.consularsorigins.sculk_shader.desc: You can see any entity that is moving without sneaking. And you can make out small details in textures.
power.consularsorigins.big.name: Big
power.consularsorigins.big.description: You are slightly bigger than usual, with slightly more health and less movement speed.
power.consularsorigins.cityspawn.name: City Spawn
power.consularsorigins.cityspawn.descrip: You spawn in an ancient city.
power.consularsorigins.silentstep.name: Silent Step
power.consularsorigins.silentstep.descri: Your footsteps will not cause vibrations.
power.consularsorigins.darkness_immunity: You are immune to the darkness effect.
origin.consularsorigins.bat.name: Bat
origin.consularsorigins.bat.description: Bats are small creatures blessed with the ability of flight, though they can't see colors very well.
power.consularsorigins.desaturate.name: Desaturation
power.consularsorigins.desaturate.descri: The world is much more desaturated, making colors less vibrant and more dull.
power.consularsorigins.flying.name: Flight
power.consularsorigins.flying.descriptio: You can fly as if you're in creative mode, so long as you aren't exposed to the sun.
power.consularsorigins.tiny.name: Tiny
power.consularsorigins.tiny.description: You are half a block tall, at the cost of most of your health.
power.consularsorigins.sensitive_eyes.de: Your eyes are very sensitive. You can't see very well in direct sunlight.
power.consularsorigins.bat_evolve_tip.de: You can evolve by crafting a Coffin.
origin.consularsorigins.vampire.name: Vampire
origin.consularsorigins.vampire.descript: Vampires are humanoid creatures with the ability to transform into a bat. They will burn in daylight unless they have the proper protection.
origin.consularsorigins.vampire_bat.name: Vampire Bat
origin.consularsorigins.vampire_bat.desc: The Vampire Bat is a bat with the ability to transform into a vampire. They're the same as bats otherwise.
power.consularsorigins.interchangeable.d: You can switch between vampire and bat at any time.
power.consularsorigins.vampire_burn.name: Sensitive Skin
power.consularsorigins.vampire_burn.desc: You will burn in daylight unless you are holding an umbrella in your offhand.
power.consularsorigins.speedy.name: Speedy
power.consularsorigins.life_steal.name: Life Steal
power.consularsorigins.life_steal.descri: You gain health when damaging other entities.
origin.consularsorigins.vex.name: Vex
origin.consularsorigins.vex.description: Vexes are small creatures with the ability of flight, and going through walls.
power.consularsorigins.vex_flight.name: Vex Flight
power.consularsorigins.vex_flight.descri: You can fly so long as you are phasing.
power.consularsorigins.sword_boost.name: Sword Master
power.consularsorigins.vex_dash.name: Dash
power.consularsorigins.vex_dash.descript: You can dash in the direction you're facing in.
origin.consularsorigins.fairy.name: Fairy
origin.consularsorigins.fairy.descriptio: Fairies are small, winged, magical, creatures.
power.consularsorigins.fairy_flight.name: Fairy Flight
power.consularsorigins.fairy_flight.desc: You can fly whenever you aren't in water or rain.
power.consularsorigins.no_damage.name: Pacifist
power.consularsorigins.no_damage.descrip: You do not do damage by traditional means. Instead, attacking makes the target levitate.
origin.consularsorigins.enchantling.name: Enchantling
origin.consularsorigins.enchantling.desc: Enchantlings are mysterious creatures born from wishes of others and magic of the land. (Suggested by reshmi herdin)
You can't eat normal food. However, you can eat from your experience bar.
power.consularsorigins.better_enchanting: You get better enchantments from enchanting tables.
power.consularsorigins.quick_learner.des: If there are 4 or more bookshelves nearby, you can study them to gain xp.
power.consularsorigins.cant_eat.name: Hungry for Knowledge
origin.consularsorigins.lizardling.name: Lizardling
origin.consularsorigins.lizardling.descr: Lizardlings are small, reptilian creatures that can climb walls.
power.consularsorigins.climbing.name: Climbing
power.consularsorigins.climbing.descript: You can climb any solid block
power.consularsorigins.humid_speed.name: Humid Speed
power.consularsorigins.humid_speed.descr: You move faster in humid areas.
power.consularsorigins.cold_slow.name: Slowed by Cold
power.consularsorigins.cold_slow.descrip: You move slower in cold areas.
power.consularsorigins.lizardling_size.d: You are one block tall, and have 3 less hearts.
origin.consularsorigins.mushboi.name: Mushling
origin.consularsorigins.mushboi.descript: Born from the Mycelium, you are a mushroom. Mushrooms are poisonous, so you are poisonous. You inflict poison to anything you touch. You just love mushrooms so much.
power.consularsorigins.poisonous.name: Poisonous
power.consularsorigins.poisonous.descrip: Anything that hits you will be poisoned.
power.consularsorigins.venomous.name: Venomous
power.consularsorigins.venomous.descript: Anything you hit will be poisoned.
power.consularsorigins.implant.name: Implant
power.consularsorigins.implant.descripti: You can root yourself to any soil block (dirt, grass, etc.), and feed off of it.
power.consularsorigins.love_for_mushroom: When on mycelium, you get regeneration and resistance
power.consularsorigins.smol.name: Smol
power.consularsorigins.smol.description: You are 1.25 blocks tall, and have 3 less hearts.
power.consularsorigins.mushroom_inhabita: You spawn on a mushroom island
power.consularsorigins.antivenom.name: Antivenom
power.consularsorigins.antivenom.descrip: You are immune to poison and hunger.
origin.consularsorigins.frog.name: Frog
origin.consularsorigins.frog.description: Frogs are small, amphibian creatures that are well known for their extraordinary jumping abilities. (Suggested by Bib)
power.consularsorigins.frog_size.name: Frog Sized
power.consularsorigins.frog_size.descrip: You are the size of a frog. (0.5 blocks)
power.consularsorigins.strong_legs.name: Strong Legs
power.consularsorigins.strong_legs.descr: You move a bit slower on land. However, your jump is turned into more of a leap. You jump way higher, and you gain forward momentum when jumping. You also don't take fall damage
power.consularsorigins.fragile.name: Fragile
power.consularsorigins.fragile.descripti: You have three less hearts than usual.
origin.consularsorigins.rat.name: Rat
origin.consularsorigins.rat.description: Rats are natural scavengers, with the ability to scurry around and hide items in it's mouth, it's sure to cause some mischief! (Suggested by ratlover27)
power.consularsorigins.rat_size.name: Rat Sized
power.consularsorigins.rat_size.descript: You are half a block tall
power.consularsorigins.rat_mouth.name: Pack Mouth
power.consularsorigins.rat_mouth.descrip: You can hold up to 5 items in your mouth
origin.consularsorigins.raccoon.name: Raccoon
origin.consularsorigins.raccoon.descript: Racoons are sneaky little creatures. They can camoflague into their environment and eat anything that's otherwise harmful.
power.consularsorigins.weasel.name: Weasel
power.consularsorigins.weasel.descriptio: You are one block tall, but you have 3 less hearts. You also take less fall damage.
power.consularsorigins.opportunistic_eat: Raw food is more filling (but still not as good as cooking it). Rotten flesh and spider eyes are also more filling, and do not cause hunger or poison.
power.consularsorigins.scurry.name: Scurry
power.consularsorigins.scurry.descriptio: You can gain a burst of speed for a short time, though you will be weakened.
power.consularsorigins.camoflague.name: Sly Cooper
power.consularsorigins.camoflague.descri: You can blend in with the surroundings. You will not be able to climb while invisible.
power.consularsorigins.burrower.name: Burrower
power.consularsorigins.burrower.descript: Being used to small spaces, you are uncomfortable in places with high ceilings. You will be slowed and weakened in areas taller than 3 blocks.
power.consularsorigins.nocturnal.name: Nocturnal
power.consularsorigins.nocturnal.descrip: As a nocturnal creature, you cannot sleep. However, you can still set your spawn in beds.
power.consularsorigins.insomniac.name: Insomniac
power.consularsorigins.insomniac.descrip: Phantoms have given up on trying to make you sleep, and so they will not swarm you.
origin.consularsorigins.cloudling.name: Cloudling
origin.consularsorigins.cloudling.descri: Cloudlings are descendants of the skies. In the right conditions, these creatures are very mobile. (Requested by EchoLocation)
power.consularsorigins.translucent.name: Translucent
power.consularsorigins.translucent.descr: Your skin is see-through, making you harder to see.
power.consularsorigins.day_speed.name: Sun Blocker
power.consularsorigins.day_speed.descrip: You are slightly faster during the day
You can fly so long as your health is above 4 (2 hearts)
power.consularsorigins.cloud_armor.name: Soft
power.consularsorigins.cloud_armor.descr: You can't wear any armor stronger than chainmail, as it is too heavy for your soft body.
power.consularsorigins.cloud_invisibilit: You can become completely invisible, at the cost of some of your hunger.
origin.consularsorigins.moobloom.name: Moobloom
origin.consularsorigins.moobloom.descrip: Mooblooms are peaceful creatures that tend to get along with bees. They specialize in farming. (Requested by rjdoesntexist)
power.consularsorigins.photosynthesis.de: When exposed to the sun, all sources of healing are doubled.
power.consularsorigins.bonemeal.name: Green Thumb
power.consularsorigins.bonemeal.descript: You have bonemeal points, these can be spent to bonemeal crops by right clicking them.
power.consularsorigins.compost.name: Compost
power.consularsorigins.compost.descripti: When you eat, you gain bonemeal points.
power.consularsorigins.friendly_bees.des: Bees will never be angry with you, no matter what.
power.consularsorigins.cousins.name: Cousins
power.consularsorigins.cousins.descripti: Being closely related to cows, you cannot bear to wear leather armor.
origin.consularsorigins.hoglin.name: Hoglin
origin.consularsorigins.hoglin.descripti: Hoglins are hostile boars that inhabit the nether. They're rumoured to behave differently in the overworld.
You are smaller than the normal player, but you are much healthier. You also have a further attack reach.
power.consularsorigins.pork_brothers.des: Other Hoglins will not attack you.
origin.consularsorigins.zoglin.name: Zoglin
origin.consularsorigins.zoglin.descripti: Zoglins are hostile boars that are a bit out of place. They thrive in the nether, and behave differently there.
power.consularsorigins.small_and_less_mi: You are smaller than normal, but healthier. Though not as much as the Hoglin. You're also slower than the hoglin.
origin.consularsorigins.striderling.name: Striderling
origin.consularsorigins.striderling.desc: An early decendant of the stider, known for it's ability to carry others over lava. (Suggested by MeetSofa)
power.consularsorigins.striding.name: Striding
power.consularsorigins.striding.descript: You can walk on lava! But be careful, it won't stop fall damage.
power.consularsorigins.cool_guy.name: Cool Guy
power.consularsorigins.cool_guy.descript: You're such a cool little dude. Piglins won't attack you.
power.consularsorigins.mount.name: Mount
power.consularsorigins.cozy.name: Cozy
power.consularsorigins.cozy.description: You get cold when you're not in the lava, and you will be slowed down.
